author: dddmemaybe

text: I'm glad to still have the possibility to play new but old school games like Axiom Verge, with the vast majority coming from indies. This was easily a top 10 game of 2015 for me despite the couple flaws I listed in the previous upload. I still remember watching the announcement trailer for this game on the Playstation YT channel with this theme playing, it quickly shot the game up my most anticipated list.
